## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) facing DOWN (output at 15.5, 72.5)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5) (empty)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) (currently not powering the drill)
- Stone furnace at (26.0, 71.0) (unfueled, no ingredients)
- Transport belt path from drill to furnace (17.5, 72.5 to 25.5, 72.5)
- Note: System currently non-functional due to power and connection issues

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - UPDATED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) connected via pipes to:
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) (fueled with coal, 8 remaining)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) (connected to power network)
- Pipe network operational with water and steam
- Power pole network operational but not reaching mining setup

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement collision errors (continued)
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities (now with 24 total occurrences)
- When replacing existing setups, clear old entities completely before placing new ones (3 new failures)
- Check for hidden entities (like underground belts) when clearing areas

### Inserter placement issues (updated)
- Ensure proper spacing when placing inserters (9 new failed attempts)
- Verify inserter fuel status before attempting operations
- Check inserter directionality when connecting production chains
- Clear existing entities completely before inserter placement attempts

### Belt connection rules (updated)
- Cannot connect belts directly to inserters (2 new occurrences)
- Verify source and destination entity types before attempting belt connections
- Check belt path continuity before expecting operation

### Power system issues (new)
- Ensure power poles connect to all electrical devices (mining drill currently unpowered)
- Verify power network coverage when placing new electrical devices
- Check power pole spacing requirements

### Furnace operation (updated)
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and input materials before expecting operation (3 new failures)
- Monitor furnace fuel levels during operation
- Verify inserter connections to furnaces are functional

### Production chain verification (updated)
- Verify all components are properly connected before expecting operation
- Check input/output connections for all production chain components
- Test small sections before completing entire production chain

## NAMESPACE

### Functions
- find_clear_position(position: Position, min_distance: int) -> Position
  Attempts to find a clear position for entity placement
  Failure: Still missing proper error handling for no clear position found

### Variables
- base_position: Position - Stores base coordinates for operations
- iron_drill: Entity - Reference to mining drill entity (now unpowered)
- power_pole: Entity - Reference to power pole entity
- furnace: Entity - Reference to furnace entity (now at new position)
- boiler: Entity - Reference to boiler entity (fuel status updated)
